item.description:
The weather is getting colder and winter is around the corner. So that means it's time to visit the Harpoon brewery to stock up on some Winter Warmer and Chocolate Stout; after first touring the brewery, of course!

From the Harpoon website:
You will be guided through the brewery on a tour with our staff and learn how Harpoon makes all of its beers. After the tour, all visitors over 21 years of age will enjoy samples of Harpoon and UFO beers.

Includes a souvenir glass, tour, and tasting. A portion of the tour fee goes to Harpoon Helps.

We will try and hit the first tour at 11:30, and after the tasting, we will grab lunch at one of the nearby pubs and restaurants.

The tour costs $5, and make sure to bring valid ID.

See you there!
item.name: Harpoon Brewery Tour
